main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 28-29 August 1961 in Redondo Beach, California.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 7 minutes., The object was observed at an estimated altitude of 450 feet., The shape of the object is noted as 2000 and 2030., The observations were made from the ground., The conclusions included possibilities of the object being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
witness description: A. W. G. Bass, Captain, USAF
